replacements.console.error(\"Failed to refresh MCP st: console.error("刷新 MCP 状态失败：未返回数据 (Failed to refresh MCP status: no data returned)")
replacements.console.error(\"Failed to toggle MCP:\",: console.error("切换 MCP 失败 (Failed to toggle MCP):", error)
replacements.\"Failed to refresh MCP status: no data: "刷新 MCP 状态失败：未返回数据 (Failed to refresh MCP status: no data returned)"
replacements.\"Failed to toggle MCP:\": "切换 MCP 失败： (Failed to toggle MCP:)"

note: 不翻译 status.status 值（API返回的英文状态字符串）
